description: Quick and easy. Serve with white rice or mashed potatoes.
name: Sweet & Sour Sausage Mince Balls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 can large pineapple chunks, in juice

recipeInstructions.text: Add pinch of salt to Sausage Mince and roll mince into walnut sized balls.
Fry in oil until cooked through.
Drain oil and set aside on paper towel.
Drain juice from pineapple and place the juice in saucepan. Keep pineapple pieces for later.
Heat pineapple juice on low heat.
Place egg yolk, corn flour, vinegar and honey into a jar and shake until combined.
Add this mixture to hot pineapple juice, lower heat, stir constantly until mixture thickens.
Place meatballs into casserole dish and pour sauce over them. Add pineapple chunks if desired.
